servinfo.title: Rear Fog Light Switch Inspection (If Equipped)

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Headlight Switch (in Lighting Switch) Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Rear fog light switch can be turned to ON position only when lighting switch is turned to HEAD position (low or high beams).
Rear fog light switch turns OFF automatically when lighting switch is turned to OFF position.

servinfo.ptxt: Check for continuity between terminals at each switch position.
If check result is not as specified, replace switch.
